info.author: Eugene Ivanchenko
info.description:
# Overview

Default client for LBSMC to be used from NCBI dbSNP Django projects.

# Installation

```sh
pip install ncbi-django-pyodbc-lbsm
```

# Use

Database engine based on django-pyodbc-azure that overrides database connection. If OPTIONS dictionary contains load_balancer it must be an object with choose method which returnds list of hosts.

Example configuration:

```python

from ncbi_load_balancer import LoadBalancer

DATABASES = {
    'default': {
        'ENGINE': 'sql_server_lb',  # !
        'NAME': 'database',
        'USER': 'user',
        'PASSWORD': 'password'
        'HOST': 'host',  # Not used
        'PORT': 1433,
        'COMMAND_TIMEOUT': 360,
        'CONN_MAX_AGE': 3600,  # Persistent connection limited to an hour
        'OPTIONS': {
            'load_balancer': LoadBalancer('LBSM_LABEL OR SQL SERVER'),
            'driver': 'FreeTDS',
            'host_is_server': True,
            'extra_params': 'TDS_Version=7.3',
        }
    },
}
```

Django will take care of other.
info.name: ncbi-django-pyodbc-lbsm
info.summary: Default client for LBSMC to be used from dbSNP django projects
